data:query.name: Report
data:query.data:static-query: SELECT DD.YEAR4 AS GROUPBY ,YYYYMM AS ORDINAL ,DD.MONTH_LONG_DESC AS PERIOD ,AVG(IF(DA.ACTIVITY_PARENT_TYPE = 'Cases', ACTIVITY_DURATION, NULL)) AS CASES ,AVG(IF(DA.ACTIVITY_PARENT_TYPE = 'Leads', ACTIVITY_DURATION, NULL)) AS LEADS ,AVG(IF(DA.ACTIVITY_PARENT_TYPE = 'Opportunities', ACTIVITY_DURATION, NULL)) AS OPPORTUNITIES FROM F_ACTIVITIES FA INNER JOIN D_ACTIVITIES DA ON FA.ACTIVITY_TK = DA.ACTIVITY_TK INNER JOIN D_DATE DD ON FA.ACTIVITY_DATE_TK = DD.DATE_TK WHERE DA.ACTIVITY_TYPE = 'Call' AND DD.`YYYY-MM` BETWEEN (${pActivityFromDateFilter}) AND (${pActivityToDateFilter}) AND (FA.ACTIVITY_DELETED = ${pShowDeletedRecords} OR 1 = ${pShowDeletedRecords}) GROUP BY 1,2,3 ORDER BY 2 DESC;
